Title: Smashed
Plot: After breaking up with Tara, Willow successfully de-rats Amy and the two witches begin hanging out and having fun with magic, drawing Willow further into her growing addiction.   Meanwhile, Spike notices that his chip doesn't kick in when he hits Buffy but it only works with her, leading him to believe that she is not entirely human anymore.
GuestStars: Patrice Walters, John Patrick Clerkin, Janck Jozefson, Rick Garcia, Kelly Smith, Jordan Belfi, Adam Weiner, Melanie Sirmons, Lauren Nissi
